segments.text: Wow ! They've got everything here . All the world's famous brands . Aunt Cindy , what is your favorite brand ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love all the fashionable things . But my favorite brand is Chanel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , that's a very expensive brand , but with good reason .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . Each style is specially designed by world's top designers . So they can always make you look amazing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Come here . The high heels here look really attractive . But I wonder whether it's comfortable to wear any of them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really , especially at the beginning , if you wear high heels all day long , your feet would hurt . But , no big deal . Women can always get used to that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not a simple thing to be beautiful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . But everyone loves to be beautiful . Hey , do you think this pair of sunglasses matches the handbag well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , very tasteful . And with them , you look even more fashionable . Oh , there are so many French perfumers . Oops , perfumes for guys ? So strange !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come on . Fashion is not only for women . Men also share the equal right to chase fashion . It's the new fashion for men to wear perfumes , which is called cologne .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really , that's really something new . I'm afraid not everyone can accept it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It takes time for that . But people's consuming attitudes are changing quickly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true . Well , it's obvious that fashion is not a cheap thing . So , do you spend all your money on it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Fashion is just part of my life , which improves its quality . But also , I'm good at financing . I have a credit card , but I never overdraft .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How is it that you are my mom's sis ? You two are so different . She always picks up bargains and spends more than she earns . You do so much better than her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to say that's just the result of difference of our consumptive habits .
segments.speaker: S2
